summary:
Passionate about driving business growth through strategic marketing and innovative solutions. With over 10 years in the dynamic world of marketing, I've cultivated expertise in multi-channel communications, brand positioning, and customer-centric strategies. My journey has led me through diverse roles, from spearheading global digital demand and growth strategies to establishing a creative environment that fosters innovation.

In my current role as Marketing Director at Bolton Group, I've leveraged my skills to improve customer experience, brand recognition/awareness and increase ROMI. Prior to this, as Director of Demand Generation at Sonova, I excelled in demand generation, user experience, digitalisation and continuous improvement .

I thrive on challenges and excel at transforming visionary concepts into actionable results. My accomplishments include building high performance teams and over achieving targets , showcasing my dedication to delivering measurable impact. Through my career, I've honed skills in strategic planning, team leadership, and data analysis, driving success across various projects.

I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends in the ever-evolving marketing landscape. Let's connect and collaborate on propelling your business to new heights!
